It was WONTFIX'ed a long time ago in bug 214193.

But the Profile Manager UI itself will be removed from Firefox soon (see <http://www.ghacks.net/2011/01/19/firefox-profile-manager-to-be-removed-soon/>), and it will be replaced with an application for the people that want profiles (see <http://jagriffin.wordpress.com/2011/01/11/profilemanager-1-0_beta1/>). It will be a bit different though, you won't be able to switch profiles on the fly (which would require a full restart anyway !).

comments.text: That's not possible at the moment - there can be only browser (with 1 profile) active on your screen, as it's used to share cookies, bookmark, history and other resources among the different windows.
